mapper.select: SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id WHERE c_in.department_id = #{departmentId}

SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id

SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id where date_format(removeTime,'%Y')=#{year}

SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id where date_format(removeTime,'%Y')=#{0} and date_format(removeTime,'%c')=#{1}

SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id where c_in.department_id=#{departmentId}

SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id where c_in.department_id=#{0} and date_format(removeTime,'%Y')=#{1}

SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id where c_in.department_id=#{0} and date_format(removeTime,'%Y')=#{1} and date_format(removeTime,'%c')=#{2}
mapper.sql: in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, inOrgan, outOrgan, oldNum, newNum, car_id, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from c_in
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into c_in (in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, inOrgan, outOrgan, oldNum, newNum, car_id, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2) values (#{inId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{diaorutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rbeiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rbieyong2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into c_in
in_id,
removeTime,
diaorutime,
inOrgan,
outOrgan,
oldNum,
newNum,
car_id,
removeNum,
stats,
notes,
rbeiyong1,
rbieyong2,

mapper.update:
update c_in
in_id = #{record.inId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
removeTime = #{record.removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
diaorutime = #{record.diaorutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
inOrgan = #{record.inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outOrgan = #{record.outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oldNum = #{record.oldnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
newNum = #{record.newnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_id = #{record.carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
removeNum = #{record.removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stats = #{record.stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notes = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rbeiyong1 = #{record.rbeiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rbieyong2 = #{record.rbieyong2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update c_in set in_id = #{record.inId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, removeTime = #{record.removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, diaorutime = #{record.diaorutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inOrgan = #{record.inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outOrgan = #{record.outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oldNum = #{record.oldnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newNum = #{record.newnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{record.carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, removeNum = #{record.removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stats = #{record.stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rbeiyong1 = #{record.rbeiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rbieyong2 = #{record.rbieyong2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update c_in
removeTime = #{removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
diaorutime = #{diaorutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
inOrgan = #{inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outOrgan = #{outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oldNum = #{oldnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
newNum = #{newnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
removeNum = #{removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stats = #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rbeiyong1 = #{rbeiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rbieyong2 = #{rbieyong2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where in_id = #{inId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_in set removeTime = #{removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, diaorutime = #{diaorutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inOrgan = #{inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outOrgan = #{outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oldNum = #{oldnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newNum = #{newnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, removeNum = #{removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stats = #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rbeiyong1 = #{rbeiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rbieyong2 = #{rbieyong2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where in_id = #{inId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
